short_summary: National Research Council National Programs and Business Services requires the services of a consultants to provide both strategic and method oriented insights from key stakeholders and peer review committees to support an assessment of program direction, outcomes, and any needed adjustment.
description: The SELS-IWS will funds the research and testing of new traininig approach that were allow the traininig programe  to evolve into Centre Of Expertise model. Request for Proposals Footnote 1. at the end of the training progarmuel.
duration_in_months: Our current S-36 program is scheduled to end in April 2023 and we will be implementing our new S-36.2 program starting in April 2023. The new program is a Centre of Expertise. For more fstructured information, Please refer to attachment.
